title: Let's Play in the Pool
story: Let's play in the pool, Helen. Okay, Linda.  It's fun. It's so hot today. Not in the pool. I know. I like it here. We can do this every day. Sure, we can, Linda.
summary: Helen and Linda enjoy playing in the pool and plan to do it every day.
image: An illustration of Helen and Linda playing in a pool on a sunny day.
